description: Table contains information regarding the sender of a communication and the recipients of the communication. In a record the 1st entry is assumed to be the sender, subsequent entries are the recipients.

columns.name: COMMUNICATION_ID
columns.description: LCA routing record id

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: COMM_NAME
columns.description: Name of the sender/recipient

columns.name: COMM_INI
columns.description: INI of the sender/recipient

columns.name: COMM_ID_USER
columns.description: ID  the sender/recipient

columns.name: FAX_NUM
columns.description: fax number of the sender/recipient that communication would be sent to if a fax method was used to send the communication

columns.name: PHONE_NUM
columns.description: phone number of the sender/recipient

columns.name: ADDRESS
columns.description: address of the sender/recipient that communication would be sent to if a mailing method was used to send the communication

columns.name: CITY
columns.description: city of the sender/recipient that communication would be sent to if a mailing method was used to send the communication

columns.name: STATE
columns.description: state of the sender/recipient that communication would be sent to if a mailing method was used to send the communication

columns.name: ZIP_CODE
columns.description: zip code of the sender/recipient that communication would be sent to if a mailing method was used to send the communication

columns.name: COUNTRY
columns.description: country of the sender/recipient that communication would be sent to if a mailing method was used to send the communication

columns.name: SENT_METHOD_C_NAME
columns.description:
The Send Method category number for the communication.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


In Basket


Fax


Mail


Phone Call


MyChart


Network Printer


Courier Service


Outside Provider Messaging


Print Locally


EDI


Opt Out


E-mail


FHIR


Save to File

columns.name: FILE_CREATED_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if a file was created for that recipient. If so can look in attachments at blob columns for the file name.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: EMAIL
columns.description: email address of the sender/recipient

columns.name: HOUSE_NUM
columns.description: House number of the sender/recipient that communication would be sent to if mailing method was used to send communication.

columns.name: DISTRICT_C_NAME
columns.description:
District of the sender/recipient that communication would be sent to if mailing method was used to send the communication.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: COUNTY_C_NAME
columns.description:
County of the sender/recipient that communication would be sent to if mailing method was used to send the communication.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: COMM_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the user record for this communication if COMM_INI is EMP. This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_EMP table.

columns.name: COMM_PROV_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the provider record for this communication if COMM_INI is SER. This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_SER table.

columns.name: COMM_PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the patient record for this communication if COMM_INI is EPT. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: ORGANIZATION_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the organization record for this communication if COMM_INI is DXO. This column is frequently used to link to the ORG_DETAILS table.

columns.name: ORGANIZATION_ID_EXTERNAL_NAME
columns.description: Organization's external name used as the display name on forms and user interfaces.

columns.name: COMM_REG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the pool record for this communication if COMM_INI is HIP. This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_HIP table.

columns.name: COMM_REG_ID_REGISTRY_NAME
columns.description: The name of the In Basket registry in the HIP master file.

columns.name: CONSENT_DOC_INFO_ID
columns.description: DCS record that contains patient consent for sending the communication to this recipient.

columns.name: COMM_CE_SUB_MTHD_C_NAME
columns.description:
The sub-routing method category ID for the communication.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


None


Outgoing Direct Address


EpicCare Link Direct Address


MedCom


PCEHR


Kanta


Pika XML

columns.name: SENT_DIRECT_ADDRESS
columns.description: The address level Direct address of the recipient to whom the communication is routed.
